title: MA30007: Computer Software - Quick Facts

Course name | Computer Software

Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Spring

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: voidPositional Value system, binary and hexadecimal representation, BCD arithmetic, 2s complement representation and arithmetic, Boolean algebra and switching Theory, error correcting code, grey codes, prefix and postfix expressions. Priority and circular queue, hashing, link list, height balanced tree, B-tree. Algorithms: Backtracking, branch and bound, complexity of algorithms, P, NP, NPC problems, lower bound theory. Random number and simulation, problems in combinatorics. Introduction to assembly languages, lambda expressions and fixed point.
